name: Professional
description:
Professional is a stealth/action game where you must figure out how to get into heavily guarded buildings and compounds in order to take out your targets or steal information. You take on the role as a mob hit-man who has fallen into debt with a greedy mob boss. Now you must take on jobs for him to repay your debt.

Key Features

-Multiple ways to get to your target

-Use strategy to get around guards, or try to kill every guard you see.

-Guards react to sound and can be alerted by security camera's

-Different types of guards with different weapons, and sight ranges.

-Rating given after successful hit. Are you a professional or just a thug?
